title: Understanding Circular References
text: A circular reference occurs when a formula in a cell refers back to itself, either directly or indirectly. This can cause errors in calculations.

title: Direct Circular Reference
text: A direct circular reference happens when a formula in a cell directly refers to itself. For example, if cell A1 contains the formula $$A1+A3$$, it is a direct circular reference.

title: Identifying the Correct Formula
text: Which of the following formulas in cell A1 would create a direct circular reference?
